LanguageData.Bullet_ChargeLanceRifle.label: charge shot
LanguageData.RM_Bullet_ChargeLancePistol.label: charge lance shot
LanguageData.RM_Bullet_ChargePistol.label: charge shot
LanguageData.RM_Bullet_InfernoLauncher.label: inferno shell
LanguageData.RM_Gun_ChargeLancePistol.label: charge lance pistol
LanguageData.RM_Gun_ChargeLancePistol.description:
A small pulse-charged rail-assisted lance pistol. It fires a single small projectile at high velocity, charging it with unstable energy as it leaves the acceleration rail.
This variant functions like a precision handgun with a compensator, allowing it to fire consistent, accurate shots that are more powerful.
LanguageData.RM_Gun_ChargeLanceRifle.label: charge lance rifle
LanguageData.RM_Gun_ChargeLanceRifle.description: An ergonomic pulse-charged rail-assisted lance rifle. Fires a three-round burst shot at high velocity, charging them with unstable energy as they leave the acceleration rail. Less accurate compared to a single shot, the intention is to intimidate as much as it is to maim.
LanguageData.RM_Gun_ChargePistol.label: charge pistol
LanguageData.RM_Gun_ChargePistol.description:
A charged-shot burst-fire sidearm. Pulse-charge technology charges each shot with unstable energy as it leaves the barrel. Released on impact, the charged energy greatly increases the damage done.
Designed as a sidearm for infantry mechanoids with manipulators similar to human hands. The attached blade gives it superior melee viability.
LanguageData.RM_Gun_ChargePistol.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.RM_Gun_ChargePistol.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.RM_Gun_ChargePistol.tools.blade.label: blade
LanguageData.RM_Gun_InfernoLauncher.label: inferno launcher
LanguageData.RM_Gun_InfernoLauncher.description:
A portable version of the Inferno cannon, this fires smaller incendiary warheads. While capable of putting out a burst of four shells, this also means that it suffers in terms of range and accuracy compared to the original. The entire front casing has been weakened to handle multiple shells, weakening the weapon as a whole.
Designed as a support weapon for infantry mechanoids with manipulators similar to human hands, however they are incredibly cumbersome.
LanguageData.RM_Gun_InfernoLauncher.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.RM_Gun_InfernoRifle.label: inferno rifle
LanguageData.RM_Gun_InfernoRifle.description:
A portable version of the Inferno cannon, this fires smaller incendiary warheads. While it can fire more rapidly thanks to less recoil, this also means that it suffers in terms of range and accuracy compared to the original.
Designed as a support weapon for infantry mechanoids with manipulators similar to human hands, however they are quite cumbersome.
LanguageData.RM_Gun_InfernoRifle.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.RM_Gun_InfernoRifle.tools.barrel.label: barrel
